entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

entity.name: President Trump and First Lady Melania visit the Taj Mahal
entity.description: The US president began his first two-day India visit in Ahmedabad where he joined Prime Minister Narendra Modi in opening the world's biggest cricket stadium. He is accompanied by First Lady Melania, daughter Ivanka and son-in-law Jared Kushner. The president then flew to Uttar Pradesh to visit the iconic Taj Mahal at sunset.

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.

text: @realDonaldTrump Translation: I knew about this coronavirus but totally gutted my bioterrorism and emergency pandermic response 2 years ago so instead I golfed, had a super@bowl party, went to NASCAR, had a 600,000 plate fundraiser, then off to India for rose petal toss. Got you suckers!!
